column4: Commentary about Edgy Eft: I think 6.10 have the best interface I've ever seen in any other linux distro, and it is very welll integrated. But I'm still waiting for the guys of Gnome to make the menu fonts in the panel to be bold, please!!
can't you just change that in the preferences?
